trends: There has been one other sighting in Ambler
There were no other sightings in Ambler on or around February 5th 2009
Summary: 4 very very bright lights moving very very fast.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home, when i saw a craft flying across my path. there were four extremely bright white lights. i couldn't tell what the shape of the object was because it was dark. but it was fairly close to the ground. i didn't make any noise, i thought it was a plane at first (naturally) but it was flying much too fast, too low, and there were no anti collision lights. just 4 really bright lights. all the object did was very quickly fly across my path, so i turned the corner to get a better look at it but it was no where to be seen, it just vanished. i immediately told my girlfriend about what had happened. i thought that if i had ever seen a ufo i'd be a little scared, but i wasn't.
